      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main server method. Initializes the server, retrieves the historical from the historical file, then treats any incoming client connection.
        Parameters:
        args - Application arguments, must be the server port.

      • sendConnectionMessage

        public static void sendConnectionMessage(java.lang.String name)
        Sends to the communication thread a message announcing the connection of a client.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the client to announce.

      • sendDisconnectionMessage

        public static void sendDisconnectionMessage(java.lang.String name)
        Sends to the communication thread a message announcing the disconnection of a client.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the client to announce.

      • sendHistorical

        public static void sendHistorical(java.net.Socket clientSocket)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Sends to a client the whole historical of the messages.
        Parameters:
        clientSocket - the socket of the client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception is raised by the client socket

      • initHistorical

        public static void initHistorical()
        Initializes the historical by retrieving all the messages from the historical file.

        Appends a message to the historical file to save it.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to save
        Throws:
